description: The stadium houses the headquarters of the GAA and will be used during the Covid-19 pandemic.
title: Covid-19: Criminal trials to be held at Croke Park due to pandemic
title_page: Covid-19: Criminal trials to be held at Croke Park due to pandemic - BBC News
maintext: Courts Service CEO Angela Denning said the service had been "challenged across the country to try and facilitate criminal trials", and that it had a responsibility to safety.
